              that
              ?

speaker: BIANCA
text:
He

              at

speaker: IAGO
text:
O
              ,

              I

text:
O

              !

text:

              of

text:
As
               
              you

As

              ?

              !

              upon
               
              thee
              !

speaker: IAGO
text:
Kind
               
              gentlemen

text:
